Generated Narrative: SearchParameter

Resource SearchParameter "DocumentReferenceCdL-ChainedPatient"

Standards Status: trial-use

url: http://esante.gouv.fr/ci-sis/fhir/SearchParameter/CdL_DocumentReference_Patient

version: 0.1.0

name: CdL_DocumentReference_Patient

derivedFrom: http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/clinical-patient

status: active

experimental: false

date: 2021-12-01

publisher: ANS

contact: ANS: https://esante.gouv.fr

description: [DocumentReference](documentreference.html): Who/what is the subject of the document reference to patient chained to identifier

code: patient

base: DocumentReference

type: reference

expression: DocumentReference.subject.where(resolve() is Patient)

xpathUsage: normal

target: Patient

multipleOr: true

multipleAnd: true

modifier: missing, type, identifier

chain: identifier

name: CdL_DocumentReference_Patient
description:
[DocumentReference](documentreference.html): Who/what is the subject of the document
reference to patient
chained to identifier
